en.name: Golden Troupe
en.4p: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 25%. Additionally, when not on the field, Elemental Skill DMG will be further increased by 25%. This effect will be cleared 2s after taking the field.

zh.name: 黄金剧团
zh.2p: 元素战技造成的伤害提升20%。
zh.4p: 元素战技造成的伤害提升25%；此外，处于队伍后台时，元素战技造成的伤害还将进一步提升25%，该效果将在登场后2秒移除。
